about_the_game:
Coaching Simulator is an innovative simulation game that combines educational and entertaining mechanisms, offering players the opportunity to both learn and enjoy their time. The game features effective study techniques, short lesson videos, computer-assisted research, AI coaching services, and language practice. Additionally, it provides creative crafting areas and mini-games for players to relax and have fun.

  • Pomodoro System: Players can sit at pomodoro desks in the library and choose study sessions of 30, 45, or 60 minutes, during which they cannot engage in any other activity. This helps them develop efficient study habits in real life.

  • Quick Study System: In designated sections of the library, players can watch short lesson videos to quickly gain knowledge, particularly in subjects like mathematics.

  • Computer System: Players can use computers in the library to watch long educational videos or conduct online research. This feature is ideal for in-depth learning and research.

  • AI Coaching NPC for University Selection: Players can consult an AI coach to determine which universities and programs they can apply to based on their verbal, numerical, or equally weighted scores and rankings.

  • English Practice NPCs: Players can practice English at A1, A2, B1, and B2 levels. They can engage in simulations of real-life scenarios, such as encountering situations in a foreign restaurant.

  • Crafting Area: Players can relieve stress by creating or destroying various items in this area. It allows them to use their creativity to relax.

  • Mini-Games: Scattered throughout the game world, mini-games provide short bursts of fun and entertainment for players during their breaks.
